price: 35. Na bolamu kowuta epai na biso. Lolenge wana nde tofutaka oyo azali kotondo (Allah)
arabic: نِّعۡمَةٗ مِّنۡ عِندِنَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي مَن شَكَرَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: niʿ'matan min ʿindinā kadhālika najzī man shakara
